mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.fanxiaoshenqing_uuid_number as fanxiaoshenqingUuidNumber ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.fanxiaoshenqing_time as fanxiaoshenqingTime ,a.jiankangma_photo as jiankangmaPhoto ,a.xingchengma_photo as xingchengmaPhoto ,a.hesuanbaogao_photo as hesuanbaogaoPhoto ,a.fanxiaoshenqing_content as fanxiaoshenqingContent ,a.fanxiaoshenqing_yesno_types as fanxiaoshenqingYesnoTypes ,a.fanxiaoshenqing_yesno_text as fanxiaoshenqingYesnoText ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail
FROM fanxiaoshenqing a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.fanxiaoshenqing_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.fanxiaoshenqingUuidNumber},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.fanxiaoshenqing_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.fanxiaoshenqingTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.fanxiaoshenqing_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.fanxiaoshenqingTimeEnd})
and a.fanxiaoshenqing_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.fanxiaoshenqingContent},'%')
and a.fanxiaoshenqing_yesno_types = #{params.fanxiaoshenqingYesnoTypes}
and a.fanxiaoshenqing_yesno_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.fanxiaoshenqingYesnoText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
